name: Spring Chic Skirt-Beauty’s Dream Studio
description:
Spring Chic Skirt is a fun-filled beauty free jeans design game.
The spring is coming,in this romantic season,do you want to design your own lace dress?Play this fun and interesting game and learn how to make some modern pattern lace dress.Start by choosing the shape of the lace dress,then paint it.Next you can accessorize them with fun and sparkly items.Finally complete the lace dress with a top and some jewelry.Come and design your own lace dress!

Features:
- How the princess designer make a gorgeous lace dress,follow me and I will show you
- Help the beauty designer to make a new lace dress
- Comfortable and fashion color matching,cute images of characters
- Fluent and clearly frames,vivid scenes
- Simple and funny operations make you easy to play Spring Chic Skirt
